title: String Hypothesis and Characters of Coset CFTs
abstract: We present an algorithm for the construction of the branching functions in the vacuum sector for affine Lie algebras based on the string hypothesis solution to a system of Bethe equations for generalized RSOS models. We also mention how the ground state structure and features of the excitation spectra like the Brillouin zone schemes of these models (and those in the same universality classes) can be extracted from combinatoric arguments and encoded in Lie algebraic terms.
